document.full_text: nissan motor co reported a 7.2 percent rise in quarterly operating profit on thursday and said global production disrupted by japan's march 11 earthquake will return to normal at least a month earlier than predicted by bigger home rival, toyota motor corp.
document.title: nissan q4 rises, sees full production likely by october
lines_and_colors: nissan motor co reported a 7.2 percent rise in quarterly operating profit on thursday and said global production disrupted by japan's march 11 earthquake will return to normal at least a month earlier than predicted by bigger home rival, toyota motor corp.
